name: Light
description: A light and elegant multi-purpose theme
author: Marc Anton Dahmen

tooltips.brand: The brand HTML, SVG or text to be used as logo
tooltips.checkboxHideInMenu: Hide this page in the main menu
tooltips.checkboxHidePrevNextNav: Hide the prev/next navigation at the bottom
tooltips.checkboxHideRelatedPages: Hide related pages at the bottom
tooltips.checkboxHideThumbnails: Hide teaser images in page grid
tooltips.checkboxShowAllPagesInPagelist: Show not only children but all pages in the pagelist
tooltips.checkboxShowInFooter: Show a link to this page in the footer menu
tooltips.checkboxShowInNavbar: Show a link to this page in the main navbar
tooltips.checkboxUseAlternativePagelistLayout: Use an alternative layout for blog, portfolio or related pages pagelists
tooltips.colorMuted: A custom override color for muted text
tooltips.colorPanelBg: A custom override color for panel backgrounds
tooltips.filterPagelistByUrl: Filters the pagelist by URLs matching a given regular expression like for example '(/portfolio|/blog)'
tooltips.formatDatePost: The format for displaying the date of a post — you can find more information about date formats here
tooltips.formatDateProject: The format for displaying the date of a project — you can find more information about date formats here
tooltips.pageIconSvg: A little SVG icon representing the page in a pagelist card
tooltips.imageAppleTouchIcon: The image to be used as the Apple touch icon
tooltips.imageFavicon: The icon to be used as favicon
tooltips.imagesSlideshow: One or more glob patterns to define the images showing up in the slideshow
tooltips.imageTeaser: The filename or glob pattern for the image to be used as the teaser image in a pagelist
tooltips.imageLogo: The path to your logo - this variable should be defined globally in the shared data section
tooltips.itemsFooter: Additional markup to be added to page's footer
tooltips.itemsHeader: Additional markup to be added to page's <head></head> section
tooltips.itemsPerPage: Limit the items of the pagelist per page
tooltips.labelClearSearch: Button text for clearing search results
tooltips.labelShowAll: Label text for filter button when no filter is selected
tooltips.labelSortDateDesc: Label text in dropdown for sorting pages by date descending
tooltips.labelSortDateAsc: Label text in dropdown for sorting pages by date ascending
tooltips.labelSortTitleAsc: Label text in dropdown for sorting pages by title ascending
tooltips.labelSortTitleDesc: Label text in dropdown for sorting pages by title descending
tooltips.locale: The locale information to format date and time according to like 'en_EN' or 'de_DE'
tooltips.logoHeight: The height of your logo - this variable should be defined globally in the shared data section
tooltips.metaDescription: An optional meta description to be used for Twitter, Facebook or similar social network cards
tooltips.metaTitle: An optional meta title to be used for the browser title bar and links used on Twitter, Facebook or similar social networks
tooltips.notificationNoSearchResults: Notification text for an empty list of search results
tooltips.ogImage: A glob pattern to select a preview image for Twitter, Facebook or similar social network cards. This could be for example `*.png, *.jpg`
tooltips.placeholderSearch: Placeholder text for the search field of the main menu
tooltips.showPagesBelow: Define an alternative URL to be used as the pagelist's parent page, instead of the current one
tooltips.slideshowHeight: The height of the slideshow in pixels
tooltips.sortPagelist: Sorting of the pages in a portfolio or blog pagelist. Note that the sorting and filtering buttons should be hidden in case this variable is defined! The default is 'date desc'. You can choose any other page variable in combination with an order (asc or desc) like ':path asc'.
tooltips.sortRelatedPages: Sorting of the pagelist with related pages. The default is 'date desc'. You can choose any other page variable in combination with an order (asc or desc).
tooltips.text: An alternative content variable. It is only displays as long as the +Main variable is empty.
tooltips.textTeaser: An alternative teaser variable. It is only displayed as long as the +Main variable is empty.
tooltips.urlTagLinkTarget: The target URL of the pagelist page for the tag buttons
tooltips.urlSearchResults: The URL of the pagelist page to show the search results
